column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/4e4e6d1feca92c346389d4221d022db8f8cd3e78 for binaries and test log.\n
@jgarzik @gavinandresen I'd like to see this in 0.8.1.\n
I don't understand this part. Why make fdsetRecv depend on the state of the write queue?\n
@laanwj That is explained in the commit message / pull request message.\n
But future readers of the code won't see your commit message. They need comments to understand what's going on.\n
